com.example.hotpot0.section2.views

Class ProfileBlobAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • com.example.hotpot0.section2.views.ProfileBlobAdapter

  • public class ProfileBlobAdapter
extends <any>
    Custom ArrayAdapter to display user profiles in a ListView.

    Each list item (blob) shows the user's profile icon and name.

      Constructors

      Constructs a new ProfileBlobAdapter.

    • Method Detail

      • getView

        public View getView(int position,
                    View convertView,
                    ViewGroup parent)
        Provides a view for an AdapterView (ListView, GridView, etc.) for the given position in the dataset.
        Parameters:
        position - the position of the item within the adapter's data set
        convertView - the old view to reuse, if possible
        parent - the parent view that this view will eventually be attached to
        Returns:
        a View corresponding to the data at the specified position
